longBusinessSummary: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business in Japan and internationally. It operates through Single-Family Housing Business; Rental Housing Business; Condominium Business; Commercial Facility Business; Business Facility Business; Environmental Energy Business; and Other Business segments. The company offers housing support services, including single-family house, rental housing, rental housing management, condominiums and condominium management, renovation, interiors, manufacture of housing parts and materials, and ground surveys and reinforcement, as well as real estate stock business under the livness brand. It also provides business solutions, such as retail and wholesale, commercial, logistics, and medical and nursing care facilities; asset management, offices and factories, general construction, urban development and industrial parks, energy solutions, environmental greening, and agriculture plant factories, as well as parking and carsharing solutions; and PPPs. In addition, the company engages in the life creation business, which includes resorts hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, home centers, fee-based homes for elderly, and cultivation, as well as advertising and travel, information technology, credit cards and loans, and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
